alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 11:28AM CDT until June 12 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1128 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Sanford to 8 miles north of Panhandle, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Pampa, Borger, Fritch, Stinnett, Skellytown and Sanford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
